title: To Know Me
description: Seventeen-year-old Mae is convinced that the consequences of her poor decisions have caused the untimely deaths of three close family members within a year, no matter how ludicrous her thoughts seem to those she loves. The solution? Run away so no one else she cares for gets hurt. Despite Maeâ€™s efforts to blend in at a new high school just long enough to graduate, she meets Ty, the "perfect guy" with his own secrets and a relentless interest in her. She must decide if she can stop running from the past and still protect those she loves; and if she does return home, whether Ty is really the right person to protect her fragile heart.Follow Mae, Ty, and new friends into college as their secrets intersect in To Know Me, To Love Me, To Forgive Me, and To Choose Me.
author: Marcy Blesy
